summary: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
cast: Aaron Burckhard|Chad Channing|Don Cobain|Jenny Cobain|Kim Cobain|Kurt Cobain|Dale Crover|Jason Everman|Dave Foster|Dave Grohl|Courtney Love|Tracey Marander|Nirvana|Krist Novoselic|Wendy O'Connor|Dan Peters|Pat Smear|Lori Barbero|Frances Bean Cobain|Eric Erlandson|Jennifer Finch|Lori Goldston|Buzz Osborne
title: Cobain: Montage of Heck
